name: Paper BMX - Bike Race Stunts
description:
BMX Paper Bike Race .io is most addictive .io Game where you can race with with intelligent Opponents Racers.

Do you have what it takes to survive in this amazing BMX Paper Bike Stunt Game.

Simple to pick-up-and-play with plenty of Opponents.

Features
• Reflex Testing addictive gameplay
• 9 different Stickman Characters and Bmx.
• Tilt or button control, whichever you prefer .
• Unique and beautiful graphic design 
• Crazy and challenging racing Tracks
• Unique physics, handling and realistic sound.


Download Now!!
